description: Describes AWS security credential configuration. See the [documentation](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/aws-sec-cred-types.html)
title: AWS Security Credentials Configuration

___accessKey.description: The AWS access key for the API

___accessSecret.description: The AWS access secret for the API

___credentialsProfile.description: The profile to use within the credentials file

___credentialsFile.description: The AWS credentials file for the API

___securityToken.description: The Session Token to use when access credentials are from temporary STS grants
